name: Dev Days 2020
body:
### Welcome to Spring Boot labs.
The lab section of this presentation is divided into "Essential Labs" and "Optional Labs". Please start essential labs and then move to optional labs if time permits.
All labs are completed, you can see the completed lab in `complete` folder in each repository.

### Essential Labs
* Building a RESTful Web Service with Spring Boot Actuator: https://spring.io/guides/gs/actuator-service/
* Consuming a RESTful Web Service: https://spring.io/guides/gs/consuming-rest/
* Accessing Relational Data using JDBC with Spring: https://spring.io/guides/gs/relational-data-access/
* Configuration and profiles in Spring Boot: https://spring.io/guides/

### Optional Labs
* Caching data with Spring: https://spring.io/guides/gs/caching/
* Building Java projects with Gradle: https://spring.io/guides/gs/gradle/
* Creating Async methods: https://spring.io/guides/gs/async-method/
* Scheduling a task: https://spring.io/guides/gs/scheduling-tasks/
* Spring Boot with Docker: https://spring.io/guides/gs/spring-boot-docker/
* Centralized Configuration: https://spring.io/guides/gs/centralized-configuration/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
